text.0: on flows the potent juice sustainer of the heavens the strength of gods whom men must hail with shouts of joy.
text.1: the goldhued started like a courser by brave men impetuously winneth splendour in the streams.
text.2: he takes his weapons like a hero in his hands fain to win light carborne in forays for the kine.
text.3: indu while stimulating indias might is urged forward and balmed by sages skilful in their task.
text.4: soma as thou art purified with flowing wave exhibiting thy strength enter thou indras throat.
text.5: make both worlds stream for us as lightning doth the clouds mete out exhaustless powers for us as twere through song.
text.6: onward he flows the king of all that sees the light the Ṛṣis lord hath raised the song of sacrifice.
text.7: even he who is adorned with sūryas arrowy beam father of hymns whose wisdom is beyond our reach.
text.8: like as a bull to herds thou flowest to the pail bellowing as a steer upon the waters lap.
text.9: so best of cheerers thou for indra flowest on that we with thy protection may oercome in fight.
